levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 2
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance.

levels.name: Essence of Valor Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Valor and gain an advantage over vigilance.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Valor has given you greater combat abilities against vigilance. Night Terror can now be used on creatures of any essence.
